title: Tails Sided Penny

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Glimmer outside a player’s house at night. This ability is disabled once you are picked up

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you do not select a player at night, you glimmer at your own house
- A random visitor to your target (or yourself if you did not visit a player) will pick you up. They now have a 20% chance to be silently roleblocked through immunity each night due to bad luck.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the player who picked you up lose the game. You may win while dead.

desc:
Post 5309
_“Some people think this is a sign of bad luck”_
